claims.object: mediate the connection between group-I metabotropic glutamate receptor subtype 5 (mGluR5)

surface_layer.definition: Proteins that form a scaffold structure within the postsynaptic density (PSD).

deep_layer.mechanism: These proteins facilitate the organization and signaling within the PSD.
